name: The Practical Pig
summary: Two of the Three Little Pigs are caught by the Big Bad Wolf while swimming. But when the wolf tries to get the third, he is captured by the third pig who uses his new lie detector to get the information about his two brothers from the wolf.....
info:
• 上映年度: 1939
  • 片长: 8min
  • 语言: 英语
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 导演: Dick Rickard
